name: Leg Swings
description: Swing one leg forward and backward to loosen up the hips and hamstrings.

name: Arm Circles
description: Make circular movements with your arms to warm up the shoulders.

name: Walking Lunges with Twist
description: Step forward into a lunge, twist your torso toward the leading leg to stretch your hips and core.

name: High Knees
description: Raise each knee alternately to hip level while jogging in place.

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: Bend forward from your hips to touch your toes, stretching the hamstrings.

name: Triceps Stretch
description: Reach one arm overhead and bend it to touch your upper back, using the other hand to assist.

name: Butterfly Stretch
description: Sit with your feet pressed together and knees out to stretch the hips and inner thighs.

name: Cat-Cow Pose
description: Alternate between arching your back upward and dipping it downward to stretch the spine.
durationRepetition: 5 cycles of cat-cow (10 seconds per pose)

name: Childâ€™s Pose
description: Sit back on your heels and stretch your arms forward to relax the back and shoulders.

name: Downward Dog
description: Form an inverted V-shape with your body, stretching the hamstrings, calves, and shoulders.

name: Warrior Pose
description: Step one leg forward, bend the knee, and stretch your arms overhead.

name: Pigeon Pose
description: Stretch one leg straight back and place the other in front with a bent knee to stretch the hips.

name: Cobra Pose
description: Lie on your stomach and press your upper body upward to stretch the chest and spine.

name: Forward Fold
description: Bend forward from the hips, reaching for your toes to stretch the lower back and hamstrings.
